Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: பல்லார் முனியப் பயனில சொல்லுவான்எல்லாரும் எள்ளப் படும்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: He who to the disgust of many speaks useless things will be despised by all.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A speaker is in the middle of a council of wise and serious people ('பல்லார்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: He is speaking a stream of useless, nonsensical, and irrelevant words ('பயனில'). These words are visualized as a cloud of annoying, buzzing flies or meaningless fluff.
Layered_Composition.Background: The entire council ('எல்லாரும்') is shown reacting with a universal expression of disgust, annoyance ('முனிய'), and scorn ('எள்ளப்படும்'). They are not listening, but are actively despising the speaker for wasting their time.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The person who speaks useless words that annoy a large group will be universally despised by them.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The useless words as buzzing flies or fluff is a clear metaphor for their annoying and insubstantial nature. The unified, collective expression of scorn on the faces of the audience is the key emotional focus.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A serious, respectable light illuminates the council. The foolish speaker and his cloud of useless words are an irritating visual and auditory intrusion. The colors are jarring and annoying.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A wide shot that captures the speaker and the unanimous, negative reaction of the entire assembly.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with a strong focus on the varied but unified expressions of contempt on the faces of the audience.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: The speaker is lit in a way that makes them look foolish and out of place.

Cultural_Anchors: Speaking useless things that many dislike (பல்லார் முனியப் பயனில சொல்லுவான்)
Will be despised by all (எல்லாரும் எள்ளப்படும்)
